name: Red Bad Cubes
description:
This game isn't build on WebGL becuase unity creates a lot of errors with no reason and I can't fix this.

When you download and extract folder, open it and double click Personal Project. I forgot about changing the name, sorry.

Hi! It's my first game called "Red Bad Cubes". It's very simple game where you need to kill red cubes by shooting them and collect powerups.
